titleStmt.title: Merciful God and loving Father, we give Thee humble and hearty thanks for thy great bounty bestow'd upon us of this place by Alfred the Great
titleStmt.author: University College (University of Oxford)

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
